sentences.sContent: She claims he fleeced her out of thousands of dollars.
sentences.sCn: 她声称他诈骗了她几千美元。

synos.tran: 羊毛，绒头织物；羊毛制的覆盖物

phrases.pCn: 金羊毛（希腊神话中出现的一件宝物）

remMethod.val: flee(逃跑) + ce → 骗完钱就跑 → 骗取

words.tran: 覆盖羊毛的；羊毛状的；羊毛似的；轻软的

trans.tranOther: If you fleece someone, you get a lot of money from them by tricking them or charging them too much
the woolly coat of a sheep, especially the wool and skin of a sheep when it has been made into a piece of clothing
